comments.content: This appears to be pre-digital. True? If so, [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090706234041/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/titling_gothic_compressed_regular/?&sample_text=Madame%20Butterfly&sample_size=74) may be your best match.

It probably is Gothic Block, but the “d” looks different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090706234041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Madame_6083.jpg)

Thank you.

Helvetica inserat flavor but the “a” is wrong.

ChrisL
Yes, probably one of the Helvetica copies that were floating around in the photocompositor days.
Seems like lettering to me: look at the different “t” tails.

Um Bel Di is my ringtone :-)

ChrisL
